text:
## Manage admin roles

In the **Account management** page, click **Manage admin roles**.

***Note** : The **Manage admin roles** feature is only available to the tenant
owner and service admins.

To assign an admin role to specific users, select the admin role, click
**Assign users** , enter the username into the **Users** box, and then click
**Save**. You can also add Microsoft 365 users or groups from the address
book.

To manage the users of an admin role, hover over the **Users** column of that
admin role and click the **Edit** button. In the **Users** box, you can enter
new users or delete users, and then click **Save**.

vec_docs:
## Manage admin roles

In the **Account management** page, click **Manage admin roles**.

***Note** : The **Manage admin roles** feature is only available to the tenant
owner and service admins.

To assign an admin role to specific users, select the admin role, click
**Assign users** , enter the username into the **Users** box, and then click
**Save**. You can also add Microsoft 365 users or groups from the address
book.

To manage the users of an admin role, hover over the **Users** column of that
admin role and click the **Edit** button. In the **Users** box, you can enter
new users or delete users, and then click **Save**.
